column4: i am experiencing heavy lag when trying to view webpages, though i can nslookup or ping the hosts instantly. the internet is working fine on my windows box in the other room (Router->Linksys Workgroup Switch->UbuntuBox & WindowsBox). I am using Edgy
Triplemeh: in both firefox AND elinks
try disabling ipv6, go into about:config and search on 'v6' double click that to disable it
